mapper.insert: INSERT INTO token (access_token, revoked, expired, user_id) VALUES (#{accessToken}, #{revoked}, #{expired}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.access_token, c.revoked, c.expired, c.user_id FROM token c WHERE c.id = #{id}
SELECT c.id, c.access_token, c.revoked, c.expired, c.user_id FROM token c WHERE c.access_token = #{accessToken}
SELECT c.id, c.access_token, c.revoked, c.expired, c.user_id FROM token c WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND expired = false
